content.proposal:
Roger Miller

The song in question refers to "Whistle-Stop," composed by Roger Miller, featured in the 1973 Disney animated film "Robin Hood." "The Hampsterdance Song," performed by Hampton the Hampster, uses a sped-up sample of Roger Miller's "Whistle-Stop." Both rooster and hamster animations are based on this song, leading to the different tempos and lyrics in separate videos.
